scripts.docker:backup-images: powershell -Command "echo 'Backing up Docker images...'; if (-not (Test-Path './backups')) { New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path './backups' | Out-Null }; echo 'Checking if Docker images exist...'; docker images | findstr 'badminton_court'; echo 'Starting backup process (this may take a while)...'; docker save -o ./backups/all-images.tar badminton_court-postal:latest badminton_court-celery-beat:latest badminton_court-celery:latest badminton_court-web-dev:latest badminton_court-web-test:latest badminton_court-web:latest badminton_court-cypress:latest badminton_court-presentation:latest badminton_court-tunnel:latest badminton_court-test-setup:latest; if ($?) { echo 'Images backed up successfully' } else { echo 'Error: Backup failed' }"
scripts.docker:restore-images: powershell -Command "echo 'Restoring Docker images...'; docker load -i ./backups/all-images.tar; if ($?) { echo 'Images restored successfully' } else { echo 'Error: Restore failed' }"
scripts.docker:backup-individual: powershell -Command "echo 'Backing up individual Docker images...'; if (-not (Test-Path './backups')) { New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path './backups' | Out-Null }; echo 'Backing up postal image...'; docker save -o ./backups/postal-image.tar badminton_court-postal:latest; echo 'Backing up celery-beat image...'; docker save -o ./backups/celery-beat-image.tar badminton_court-celery-beat:latest; echo 'Backing up celery image...'; docker save -o ./backups/celery-image.tar badminton_court-celery:latest; echo 'Backing up web-dev image...'; docker save -o ./backups/web-dev-image.tar badminton_court-web-dev:latest; echo 'Backing up web-test image...'; docker save -o ./backups/web-test-image.tar badminton_court-web-test:latest; echo 'Backing up web image...'; docker save -o ./backups/web-image.tar badminton_court-web:latest; echo 'Backing up cypress image...'; docker save -o ./backups/cypress-image.tar badminton_court-cypress:latest; echo 'Backing up presentation image...'; docker save -o ./backups/presentation-image.tar badminton_court-presentation:latest; echo 'Backing up tunnel image...'; docker save -o ./backups/tunnel-image.tar badminton_court-tunnel:latest; echo 'Backing up test-setup image...'; docker save -o ./backups/test-setup-image.tar badminton_court-test-setup:latest; echo 'Individual images backed up successfully'"
scripts.docker:restore-image: powershell -Command "param($imageName) echo 'Restoring specific Docker image...'; if (Test-Path \"./backups/$imageName-image.tar\") { docker load -i \"./backups/$imageName-image.tar\"; echo \"$imageName image restored successfully\" } else { echo \"Error: $imageName image backup not found\" }"
scripts.docker:list-backups: powershell -Command "echo 'Available image backups:'; Get-ChildItem -Path ./backups/*-image.tar -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | ForEach-Object { $_.Name.Replace('-image.tar', '') }"
